personal.name: Qixu Chen
personal.title: Researcher
bio: I am currently a senior SDE at Huawei Hong Kong Research Center. I received my Ph.D. degree from CSE Department, HKUST, adviced by Prof. Raymond Chi-Wing Wong. Previously, I interned at MSR, working with Dr. Yeye He on anomaly detection-related topics.
I have published papers in top-tier database conferences including SIGMOD, VLDB, and ICDE. I am also a recipient of the prestigious Hong Kong PhD Fellowship Scheme.
